Header: Red flag, a sign of an imminent tragedy?
Content: The people of Vellamullivaikkal in Mullaitivu say that a red flag has been hoisted nearby the Wattuwakal Bridge in Mullaitivu. It was hoisted yesterday. People say somebody might have hoisted this flag as the Wattuwakal Bridge across the Nanthikadala Lagoon is in a dilapidated condition. The people say it is dangerous to travel on this bridge which is around 200m in length. People are urging the authorities to renovate it soon to avoid a possible tragedy.
